posts.post_content:
Posted By: Denny Walsh
 SOLD 

Okay, so I finally got my departure date for Iraq, August 22nd! So, I'm lowering my price to rock bottom amounts just to get some funds back, in most cases the return is Negative but You guys and gals are totally worth!!! I will miss you all dearly! Can You imagine Not bein able to just check the board for a whole year? I'm withdrawing already...... [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/sad.gif[/IMG]

The one on the Left is in Ex - ExMt Condition, Sharp Corners, Very Nicely Centered with No Creases. Missing the writing from his belt with dark variant background, Blank back. 

The other on the right is in Very Good - Excellant Condition, Very Nicely Centered with No Creases. The Rarity of this Card Is that It Actually has The "MERCHANT GARGLING OIL" Ad Back. Not Seen to Often at all!

All forms of payment are Accepted(cept cash!) Paypal(irishdenny17@yahoo.com), Checks & MO's.
1st email to say, "I'll take them", Owns'em! 

Both Cards for $45.00 ~ Delivered
